description:
A new take on the Mammut classic, this skinny twin or double rope is ready for sending in the alpine. As one of the thinnest and lightest available, it's perfect for ice climbing, mountaineering and alpine climbing where every gram counts.

  • Dry treatment on both sheath and core protects against water and dirt
  • Coated yarns allow individual fibres to glide over each other, reducing internal friction and fully utilizing each yarn when loaded, for extra durability
  • Comes lap-coiled by the factory, so ready to climb
  • Specs shown are for use as a half rope
name: Mammut 7.5 Alpine Sender Dry Rope
